name: Straight Line Mission: WALES! The Platformer!
name_original: Straight Line Mission: WALES! The Platformer!
description:
A fan project by Shelby Doelle (not a dev or an artist)

Made in just a few days with no prior coding experience, slightly rage worthy, yet simple platformer that is based around Geowizard's straight-line missions on Youtube

See them here: youtube.com/GeoWizard

-F11 bc some monitors cut off menu items 

-Quit game does not work (if clicked, return to this page and refresh), to leave hit back on your browser

-Refreshing the in-game page and then clicking on the game with your mouse will fix any menu scrolling issues
